dcterms:creator: J. A. Boyan
A. W. Moore
dcterms:description: A continuous grid world where states are represented by two coordinates, and the agent is tasked with reaching a goal location while avoiding obstacles that incur negative rewards.
dcterms:title: Puddle World

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A simulation environment where an agent controls a lander to safely land on a surface, characterized by various state variables including position, velocity, and boolean flags for leg contact.
dcterms:title: Lunar Lander

dcterms:creator: B. Widrow
F. W. Smith
dcterms:description: A classical control problem where an agent must balance a pole upright by moving a cart along a track, receiving rewards based on the pole's position.
dcterms:title: Cart Pole
